LanguageData.FuneralStandard.ritualExpectedDesc: Once a {IDEO} member dies, other {MEMBERS} gather around their grave for {RITUAL_labelDef}.
LanguageData.FuneralStandard.ritualExpectedPostfix: {0} {1} want to carry out the funeral as soon as possible.
LanguageData.FuneralNoCorpse.ritualExpectedDesc: Once a {IDEO} member dies and the body is lost, other {MEMBERS} gather around an empty grave for {RITUAL_labelDef}.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyChat.ritualExpectedPostf: {0} {1} want to hold the celebration as soon as possible.
LanguageData.SacrificePrisoner.ritualExpectedPostfix: {0} {1} want to carry out the sacrifice as soon as possible.
LanguageData.SacrificePrisoner.descOverride: A ritualistic prisoner sacrifice. The organizer will give a speech to excite the crowd, then cut the prisoner's throat. Once the prisoner is dead, organizer will speak some finishing words.
LanguageData.SacrificeAnimal.ritualExpectedPostfix: {0} {1} want to carry out the sacrifice as soon as possible.
LanguageData.SacrificeAnimal.descOverride: A ritualistic animal sacrifice. The organizer will give a speech to excite the crowd, then cut the animal's throat. Once the animal is dead, the organizer will speak some finishing words.
LanguageData.Conversion.ritualExplanation: In case of success, their certainty will be reduced or they will convert immediately. If it backfires, their certainty in own beliefs will increase.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.ritualExpected: {0} {1} want to hold the celebration as soon as possible.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceTech.descOverride: A dance party with loud music. Participants will gather, socialize, and dance to have fun and connect with each other.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.ritualExpected: {0} {1} want to hold the celebration as soon as possible.
LanguageData.CelebrationPartyDanceDrum.descOverride: A dance party with drums. Participants will gather, socialize, play drums, and dance to have fun and connect with each other.
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.ritualExpectedPos: {0} {1} want to hold the celebration as soon as possible.
LanguageData.CelebrationSkyLanterns.descOverride: A social ritual where people release skylanterns. Participants will assemble wooden skylanterns while socializing, then release them and watch them drift away.
LanguageData.CelebrationTree.descOverride: A party around a Christmas tree. Participants will gather around a Christmas tree and make merry.
LanguageData.BurnCircle.descOverride: A ritualistic burning of a hated symbol. Participants will gather around a sacrificial structure, light it on fire, and celebrate as it burns to ash.
LanguageData.SmokeCircle.descOverride: A ritualistic smoking of large amounts of smokeleaf. Participants will gather around a burnbong or incense shrine, light it on fire, and celebrate while inhaling the fumes.
LanguageData.FeastCannibal.descOverride: A ritualistic flesh-eating meal. Participants gather around a platter of human flesh and bloodily feast on it.
LanguageData.ScarificationCeremony.ritualExpectedPost: {0} {1} want to carry out the scarification as soon as possible.
LanguageData.BlindingCeremony.ritualExpectedPostfix: {0} {1} want to carry out the blinding as soon as possible.
